Carry-on Baggage
Strict limits apply to the weight, size and number of carry-on baggage items allowed. If you exceed these limits, charges will apply at the airport.

Starter fares include two carry-on items with a total weight of 7kg. Need more weight? Purchase a top-up of 3kg for a total weight of 10kg via Manage My Booking on desktop, our Call Centre or during Online Check-in. Size restrictions apply, limited availability.
